item.title: Shola-grasslands in Western Ghats, India
item.description: Well, this year started with fire. I mean literally!This January Carla and I visited Bangalore to meet Vishu, my undergraduate advisor, for a lab visit. We spent the week discussing research in our respective labs. Vishu also took us to see shola-grasslands in the Western Ghats of Karnataka, where we saw an actual fire (probably anthropogenic) burning the grass layer. Here is the time lapse video that I made.We had a great time in Bangalore discussing science and international politics and
